title: Alexander Lawson
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080900/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080900/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writers) : Alexander Lawson**

Alexander S. Lawson taught typography at [Rochester Institute of Technology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080900/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rochester%20Institute%20of%20Technology) from 1947 to 1977. His most well-known work is _Anatomy of a Typeface_ (David R. Godine, 1990), still a much recommended book among type aficionados.

In late 2009 a [blog archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080900/http:/lawsonarchive.com/) was developed to honor & document his life's work.

Died: Sun City, Florida, 2002
author: James Grieshaber
